MA-164.description: HEA required before weatherization measures can be completed.

MA-254.description: HEA required for tier 2 rebates as well as completion of any weatherization measures recommended in HEA.

MA-368.description: Each measure must be recommended by ENE Home Energy Assessment audit & have a Savings to Investment Ratio (SIR) of greater than one (1).

MA-642.description: Bonus only available if pursuing a full home conversion or if displacing oil or propane.
